研究人员开发第一激光3D打印总膝盖植入物定制的3D打印医疗植入物变得越来越普遍，一项新的研究将这项技术提升到了新的水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/researchers-develop-first-first-laser-3d-print-total-knee-implant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/researchers-develop-first-first-laser-3d-print-total-knee-implant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48c09c2b-51b9-4880-95E0-60A4EDDC1ED2 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 23:17:21 -0500 Researchers develop first laser 3D-printed total knee implant
LabVantage Solutions推出了其行业领先的LIMS平台8.9版，以提高实验室的生产率和效率Labvantage Solutions，Inc。是实验室信息解决方案和服务的领先提供商，今天宣布发布LabVantage 8.9，这是其旗舰实验室信息管理系统（LIMS）的最新迭代，以向全球实验室提供最先进的功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/LabVantage-Solutions-unveils-version-89-of-its-industry-leading-LIMS-platform-to-improve-lab-productivity-and-efficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/LabVantage-Solutions-unveils-version-89-of-its-industry-leading-LIMS-platform-to-improve-lab-productivity-and-efficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddd6995b0-1e16-4A36-4A36-AF80-BDF6C59B50A3 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 23:12:00 -0500 LabVantage Solutions unveils version 8.9 of its industry-leading LIMS platform to improve lab productivity and efficiency
工程的Timps在与胶质母细胞瘤入侵作斗争方面表现出希望一份新的研究论文发表在2025年2月28日的《 Oncotarget》第16卷中，标题为“ Timps的影响及其在阻断脑癌细胞的侵袭和迁移中的最低限度工程变体”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/发动机timps-show-show-promise-in-fighting-fight-fight-fight-glioblastoma-invasusy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/发动机 - timps-show-show-inf-in-fighting-in-fighting-glioblastoma-invasona-invasion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98fcc23f-3d6f-4761-ADDD-549BACFAE5C1 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 22:59:31 -0500 Engineered TIMPs show promise in fighting glioblastoma invasion
心脏病的风险在可步行区域下降 - 但只有当居民同意它们可以步行时研究人员发现，感知的（但不是客观的）邻里的步行性与较低的心血管疾病（CVD）风险有关，而在调整后，食物环境没有显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/heart-disease-risk-drops-in-walkable-arease-arease-28094but-only-when-when-when-when-when-when-when-when-when-agagree-theyee2809999re-walkable.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/heart-disease-risk-drops-rops-in-walkable-arease-arease-28094but-only-when-when-when-when-when-when-when-agagree-theyee28099 re-walkable.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1770D-DA8D-473F-88BF-0A9EF52755D3 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 22:58:00 -0500 Heart disease risk drops in walkable areas—but only when residents agree they’re walkable
农村母亲在母乳喂养支持方面面临独特的挑战无论他们的住所，母乳喂养对于许多新妈妈来说都是一个挑战。但是，密苏里大学的一项新研究强调了美国乡村的母亲面临的独特斗争：缺乏获得支持系统和信息的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/lural-mother-mothers-face-unique-nique-challenges-in-breastfeeding-support.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/lural-mother-mothers-face-unique-nique-angellenges-in-breastfeeding-support.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d301d1C-D77F-4C23-9568-DC56BEDD0933 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 22:55:42 -0500 Rural mothers face unique challenges in breastfeeding support
NIH资金有助于解决临床试验中的小儿疾病差距根据《儿科杂志》上发表的一项最新的研究，美国国立卫生研究院（NIH）是儿童临床试验的重要资金来源，尤其是癌症等疾病，这些疾病在行业赞助的临床试验中没有得到高度优先级的优先级。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/nih-funding-helps-address-pediatric-disease-disease-disease-rials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/nih-funding-helps-address-pediatric-disease-disease-disease-disease-in-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5549fdab-dd54-4A08-B6F4-4DB6785598D6 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 22:51:41 -0500 NIH funding helps address pediatric disease gaps in clinical trials
科学家确定胚泡属。在全球近10％的可食用植物中，强调食品安全问题一项新的研究发现，全世界有9.4％的可食用植物被胚泡属Spp。污染，突出了食品安全的关注以及需要改善农业卫生的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/scientist-sideistify-blastocystis-blastocystis-spp-in-nearly-1025 of-Edible-plants-plants-plants-worlddwide-worlddwide-wighlldlightlylldlights-highllighthimhimlightighting-safe-safty-safty-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/scientists-sideify-blastocystis-blastocystis-spp-in-nearly-1025-of-sedible-plans-plants-plants-worldwide-worldwide-highlldlights-highlylightightighlighting-savety-safty-safty-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd5E77C7-4702-402-403A-BB55-363487311759 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 22:22:00 -0500 Scientists identify Blastocystis spp. in nearly 10% of edible plants worldwide, highlighting food safety concerns
研究人员发现了侵略性前列腺癌的遗传基础来自加州大学洛杉矶分校，多伦多大学和墨尔本大学的科学家发现了新的遗传线索，这些线索解释了为什么有些前列腺癌的生长缓慢，而另一些则危及生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/researchers-uncover-genetic-basis-basis-basis-oggressive-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/researchers-uncover-genetic-genetic-basis-basis-oggressive-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=310AFA3E-6DB0-4572-8CC5-BFE94E667064 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 22:18:00 -0500 Researchers uncover genetic basis of aggressive prostate cancer
30周后的溶熟药无效地出生早产在怀孕30周后威胁性早产的情况下，使用淋巴结药并不能改善婴儿的健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/tocolytic-drugs-ineffective-for-for-premement-birth-forth-ferth-fer-fer-30-weeks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/tocolytic-drugs-ineffective-for-for-prom-promplem-promemal-birth-ferth-fer-fer-30-weeks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35099b1e-0097-4d78-842f-977757007aaa00 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 22:12:55 -0500 Tocolytic drugs ineffective for premature birth after 30 weeks
研究人员发现了防止精子融合的关键生物学机制由耶鲁大学领导的研究团队发现了在哺乳动物中发现的自然存在的生物学机制如何防止精子细胞与卵相互作用，从而防止受精。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/researchers-uncover-key-biological-mechanicm-that-prevents-sperm-egg-fusion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/researchers-uncover-key-biological-mechanicm-that-prevents-sperm-egg-fusion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f39147c-f0fe-4672-81f6-3A23B41EF0B1 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 22:08:00 -0500 Researchers uncover key biological mechanism that prevents sperm-egg fusion
